item.title: How one man impacted by Trump’s federal funding freeze is helping other workers find new jobs
item.description: After being let go, Wayan Vota launched Career Pivot in an effort to other federal workers and contractors in the same situation.

item.title: People-smugglers are using TikTok videos piled with emojis and images of thick wads of cash to market services to dodge Trump border crackdown
item.description: Smugglers openly taunt U.S. authorities, with one taking a jab at Trump, referring to the president as a “high-strung gringo.”

item.title: Exclusive: Inside Pillar VC’s $175 million fourth venture fund focused on the Boston tech ecosystem
item.description: Pillar takes a unique approach by focusing on startups coming out of university research.

item.title: Renault and WeRide’s driverless bus put to the test on Barcelona streets
item.description: Renault’s initiative comes as Europe lags behind the U.S. and China in driverless vehicle technology, where companies are fiercely competing to get ah...

item.title: Why political uncertainty is a career-defining moment for aspiring CEOs
item.description: Some leaders say economic uncertainty is a big career advantage.
